pubinfo.publish: MNDNR - Division of Ecological and Water Resources - Biological Survey

descript.abstract: This dataset contains 3 main feature classes. See the detailed description of each feature class in the individual metadata files below: MNDNR Native Plant Communities DNR NPC and Land Cover - EWR DNR NPC and Land Cover - Parks and Trails
descript.purpose: To foster better understanding and protection of Minnesota's native plant communities

timeperd.current: Time Period of Content date indicates the date which the user can be confident of accuracy and completeness of the dataset. See the attribute field OBSERVATION_YEAR which indicates when specific features were observed.

theme.themekey: biota, Native Plant Communities, Natural Communities, Rare Plants, Natural Heritage, Biological Survey, Land Cover, Non-Native Communities, Facilities

idinfo.useconst: Use of the data are constrained only by the DNR GIS Data License Agreement. See the Distribution Liability section below for a link. Users must also include an acknowledgment of the Minnesota Biological Survey as the source of information to any derived products.

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Ecological and Water Resources

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically structured and verified.
dataqual.complete: NPC data are complete for each county with MBS data and all State Parks. State Forests and WMA are partially complete. Parks and Trails data are complete for each PAT unit (excluding trails) and are under constant refinement as new surveys are completed.

horizpa.horizpar: No quantitative studies of horizontal positional accuracy exist for the data. Positional accuracy can be reasonably estimated based on the characteristics of source materials and processing techniques to be 45-60 feet (14-18 meters) from correct position.

procstep.procdesc: This data is extracted from the Minnesota DNR's Native Plant Community database sytem. Candidate features and attributes go through extensive verification and quality control before being certified for publishing through the MNDNR's Geospatial Data Resource site and the Minnesota Geospatial Commons.

attracc.attraccr: Attributes go through a rigorous certification process

overview.eaover: This derived product includes coded fields (described in the detailed section of the individual layer metadata files) as well as descriptive fields, where the meanings of the codes have been added to this product for user convenience. ***Definitions for NPC complex codes which occur in the NPC_code field are found at NPC Complex list.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).
